attributes.action: Reopen Pentwyn leisure centre, as a leisure centre!
attributes.background:
Many adults and minors benefit from the facilities the leisure centre provide, we  can  no longer go swimming or take up sporting activities! 
There is nothing in the local area for kids, they have taken the only positive place for them!

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about closure or repurposing of a leisure centre are a matter for its operators, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
